name: 東方青熺伝 ～ the Lazuline Fulguration of Effervescence
name_original: 東方青熺伝 ～ the Lazuline Fulguration of Effervescence
description:
東方青熺伝　～ the Lazuline Fulguration of Effervescence. by Ryann1908

v1.02a

The Lazuline Fulguration of Effervescence is an entry destinated for the Unconnected Card Captors event, a danmaku contest with the theme consisting of "a boss fight that uses ability cards themed after specific characters (of your choice) ala Unconnected Marketeers".

In this game, you will fight agaisnt Ichirin Kumoi & Unzan, after traversing through a challenging stage and meeting some new faces.
Don't forget to read the manual inside the game, as it provides valuable information for you to beat this game!

This game was made in LuaSTGExPlus v0.82b and uses Ryannlib.

I kindly request to not give spoilers to others about this game within the first week of launch.
